item.title: Learn Dart Programming
item.description: Good Evening, Here are the Hands-on notes for Dart Programming Language. I created these notes when I was learning Dart Language. So, these notes might help you too. You can use these notes as a quick reference to Syntax and Demo. I’ve covered almost every fundamental concept of Dart in this article. Photo by Birmingham Museums Trust 1. Basics 1.1 The Main Function Every Dart program starts execution from main() functions.
